mapper.select: SELECT `year`,SUM(print_times) AS print_times FROM zz_time_month_count where year < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') GROUP BY `year` ORDER BY `year`
SELECT `year`,SUM(print_amount) AS print_times FROM zz_time_month_count where year < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') GROUP BY `year` ORDER BY `year`
SELECT `year`,`month`,SUM(print_times) AS print_times FROM zz_time_month_count GROUP BY `year`,`month` ORDER BY `year`,`month`
SELECT `year`,`month`,`day`,SUM(print_times) AS print_times FROM zz_time_day_count GROUP BY `year`,`month`,`day` ORDER BY `year`,`month`,`day`
SELECT `year`,`month`,paper_type,times AS print_times,counts FROM zz_print_month_papertype GROUP BY `year`,`month`,paper_type ORDER BY `year`,`month`,paper_type
SELECT `year`,`month`,location,counts,times AS print_times,money FROM `zz_print_month_location` GROUP BY `year`,`month`,location ORDER BY `year`,`month`,location
SELECT `year`,`month`,`day`,print_type,times AS print_times,counts FROM zz_print_day_printtype GROUP BY `year`,`month`,`day`,print_type ORDER BY `year`,`month`,`day`,print_type
SELECT `year`,`month`,COUNT(DISTINCT ymddate) AS daycount FROM zz_print_day_printtype GROUP BY `year`,`month`
